demos.text: Our server was very helpful and friendly.
Saturday, Nov. 6th I had a group from work come in with about 35 people and the staff was amazing to accomodate us.
HP refused to give me a new one and Wal Mart refused to take it back.
There are differences that you need to know and take time to learn.

signature.instructions: Analyze the provided text to identify specific aspects related to user experiences with electronic devices, such as laptops. For each identified aspect, determine its sentiment polarity (positive, negative, or neutral) and output the results in a structured format. For example, given the input text "Hats off to the chef.", the expected output should list the identified aspect along with its corresponding sentiment polarity, formatted as aspects=[Aspect(term='chef', polarity='positive')].
